title: bandha dondaminri
sahitya:
bandha dondaminri vanda vinai muDittE vArAda vaghai sheivOm


anupallavi

  antaryAmiyin AnaippaDi naDandE amaidiyAga nALum namadu kaDamai kAppOm


caraNam    Anava mayakkinri Ashaittinavinri amarAtma shrutiyuDan Aruyir yAzh isaikka
mANikkavAcakamE mantira japamAga mAsilA jIvanE shivamaya tavamAga
